lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The senior government official said the fourth quarter performance of the domestic sector was probably worse than generally expected, while that of the external sector was better.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Although this may be due to extraordinary factors such as a sharp rise in car exports to rebuild depleted European stocks, several economists said it could mark the beginning of a recovery.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The yen's 40 pct climb against the dollar over the last two years has hit the export-driven economy hard, by forcing its companies to raise prices and lose sales in the U.
